description: [Neoichor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0691) can clear the browser history on a compromised host by changing the `ClearBrowsingHistoryOnExit` value to 1 in the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Privacy` Registry key.(Citation: Microsoft NICKEL December 2021)

external_references.description: MSTIC. (2021, December 6). NICKEL targeting government organizations across Latin America and Europe. Retrieved March 18, 2022.
